content.text:
# List of archaeological sites in County Armagh

__NOTOC__

The main reference for all sites listed is: [https://web.archive.org/web/20131026155955/http://www.doeni.gov.uk/niea/the_schedule_of_historic_monuments_-_october_2012-2.pdf NI Environment Agency, Scheduled Historic Monuments (to 15 October 2012)], unless otherwise indicated.
